subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham was ejected for a tackle in the 17th minute, and the Los Angeles Galaxy finished with nine men in a 2-0 loss to the Seattle Sounders in a Major League Soccer game in Carson, Calif., on Saturday night.
snippet: David Beckham was ejected for a tackle in the 17th minute, and the Los Angeles Galaxy finished with nine men in a 2-0 loss to the Seattle Sounders in a Major League Soccer game in Carson, Calif., on Saturday night.
